text: Musrikon xohand guft: «Agar Xudo mexost, mo va padaronamon musrik namesudem va cizero harom namekardem». Hamcunin kasone, ki pes az onho ʙudand, pajomʙaronro duruƣ ʙarovardand va xasmu azoʙi Moro casidand. Bigu: «Agar sumoro donise hast, onro ʙaroi mo oskor sozed. Vale sumo tanho az gumoni xes pajravi mekuned va duruƣgujone ʙes nested!»
